attributes.action: remove Jacqui Smith from the office of Secretary of State for the Home Department(Home Sec.)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With Jacqui Smith currently being looked into over her expenses with regards her living arrangements, the news of her expenses today - from claiming the porn through to claiming an 88p bathplug.

Jacqui Smith has shown that she has little ability, less intelligence and no grasp of what the real needs of the British people are.

She has an over obsession with data gathering, little concept of the rights of privacy and an illiberal attitude more suited to the former East Germany.

Furthermore is it both proper and a conflict of interests to employ her husband to promote her through letter writing and as we have seen today enjoy her expenses.
